backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister declaring an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing restructuring tasks, file movements, and related metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend files, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/source-bundle.txt: Text bundle containing full project source, file listings, and setup instructions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component rendering Navbar, HomePage, and Footer within a dark wrapper.
frontend/src/components/CodeBlockWithCop: Code block component with copy‑to‑clipboard support and fallback logic.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing branding, download button, and attribution with neon styling.
frontend/src/components/MotionHeading.ts: Heading component that animates into view using IntersectionObserver with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/MotionReveal.tsx: Wrapper component that reveals children with scroll-triggered animation and optional delay.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Responsive navbar with scroll detection, desktop and mobile menus, and smooth section navigation.
frontend/src/components/scroll.ts: Exports a helper function that smoothly scrolls to a section with offset and accessibility focus.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that tracks the user's reduced-motion preference via matchMedia.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file indicating no backend queries exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollProgress.ts: Tracks scroll position and progress using requestAnimationFrame with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles, color variables, typography, neon effects, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrapping the root component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes main landing page sections in order.
frontend/src/sections/About.tsx: About section with animated headings, description, and specialization cards.
frontend/src/sections/Contact.tsx: Contact section with info cards, form handling, and animated layout.
frontend/src/sections/GetCode.tsx: Renders the Get Code section with animated headings, download button, and instructions for reconstructing the project from a source bundle text file.
frontend/src/sections/Hero.tsx: Implements the hero section with a neon particle canvas animation, parallax background, and scroll‑based opacity effects.
frontend/src/sections/Services.tsx: Displays a services grid with icons, descriptions, and motion effects on a neon‑styled background.
frontend/src/sections/Works.tsx: Shows sample project cards with icons and descriptions using motion reveals and neon styling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom neon theme colors, shadows, keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state and requirements for restructuring the React + Vite frontend into a cleaner folder organization while preserving behavior.
